name: Dying Speech Simulator
description:
Videogame made for 2016's Comet Jam.

You're a grandpa on his deathbed, and you've got to say your final words to your grandson. Depending on this your he could take a  good course in life or something very different.

Controls:
  • Breath: Space bar
  • Movement: W, A, S, D
Credits:
  • Programming: Daniel Santigosa Rodríguez
  • Game design & narrative: Saúl Parra Guitiérrez
  • Art: Roberto Abad Jiménez
